name: Surfline
description:
Use the left and right arrow keys to avoid the rocks!

Surfline is a game I made in just 3 hours for the Trijam #144. The theme was "life line", which also served as an inspiration for my incredibly original title.

I decided to add a bit to the game which now means that my development time slightly exceeds 3 hours. I have adjusted my submission time accordingly, and I'm certain this is the right decision since the game is much better for it.

Also, lore explanation: The dark parts of the water are in fact not deeper bits of water, but were always intended to look like shadows from some weird triangular skyscrapers. The reason for this is simply that the surfer is in fact surfing along the (fictional) "Very-regularly-spaced-triangular-skyscraper Bay", located in the (also fictional) city of "Very-similar-looking-rocks-all-over-the-harbour Harbour City".
